alert.note: Alert for Upper Weiser River (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 4:39PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Washington County through 515 PM MDT... At 439 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over McChord Butte, or 18 miles north of Weiser, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mann Creek Guard Station around 500 PM MDT. Midvale Hill and Mann Creek Reservoir around 510 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
